sentences.sContent: His mouth crinkled into a smile.
He smiled boyishly, crinkling his eyes.
sentences.sCn: 他眯起眼睛，笑得像个孩子。

sentences.sContent: Her face crinkled up in disgust.

words.tran: 起皱的；卷缩的；绉褶多的

trans.tranOther: if you crinkle part of your face, or if it crinkles, you move it so that small lines appear on it
a thin fold, especially in your skin or on cloth, paper etc
